name: appmixer.utils.weather.GetWeatherForecast
author: David Durman <david@client.io>
description: This action gets a 5 day weather forecast by 3 hour intervals for a location.

city.label: City name
city.tooltip: City name or city name and country code. E.g. London or London,UK.

coordinates.label: Latitude and Longitude
coordinates.tooltip: Geographic coordinates in the form of comma separated latitude and longitude. Longitude must be in the range [-180, 180], latitude in the range [-90, 90]. Example: 51.51,-0.13.

units.label: Units
units.tooltip: Standard (Kelvin), metric (Celsius), and imperial (Fahrenheit) units are available.

options.label: +3 hours: time of data forecasted as timestamp
+3 hours: time of data forecasted in text
+3 hours: Atmospheric pressure on the sea level, hPa
+3 hours: Atmospheric pressure on the ground level, hPa
+3 hours: Rain volume for the last 3 hours
+3 hours: Snow volume for the last 3 hours
+3 hours: Group of weather parameters (Rain, Snow, Extreme etc.)
